name: Bonds (Lalia, gamedyx, BeatrizSabater)
description:
Summary

Visual novel where you incarnate a little child lost in the woods. You encounter a bunch of animals, running away from something. Then... what are you going to do? Choose your path and create your own version of the story.

A demo developed for the StaySafe Game Jam.

Controls

A S D W: move.  

Z - X - C: Select dialogue. 

Spacebar: Next dialogue.

Crédits

Narrative Designer — Maria Eulalia Porto Figueroba (Twitter: @laliaporto) 

Programmer Support — Beatriz Sabater Serna (Twitter: @SabaterBeatriz) 

Programmer — Diego Llorens (Twitter: @diego_llorens) 

Audio Designer — Joseph Mott (Twitter: @mottandwhite)

2D Artist — Carmen Moreno von Thode (Twitter: @lincheana) 

2D Artist — Sergio Such Picó (Twitter: @RazkuDraakon) 

Proofreader — Carmen Pastor Vidal (Twitter: @meli382)
